[docs]class ConnectionException(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class NullConnection(ConnectionException):
    pass




[docs]class RegistrationException(Exception):
    #Exceptions related to registration issues
    pass




[docs]class MessageException(ValueError):
    #Exceptions related to messaging
    pass




[docs]class NullMessage(MessageException):
    pass




[docs]class TopicException(MessageException):
    #Bad topic related exceptions
    pass




[docs]class MalformedCanonicalName(TopicException):
    #Bad structure in the canonical name
    pass




[docs]class UndefinedTopicDomain(TopicException):
    pass




[docs]class TimeoutReached(RegistrationException):
    pass




[docs]class BadResponse(MessageException):
    pass




[docs]class BadRequest(MessageException):
    pass




[docs]class SubscriptionException(Exception):
    pass
